title: John Redwood – 2022 Comments on Prime Minister not Going to COP
author: admin
summary: The comments made by John Redwood, the Conservative MP for Wokingham, on Twitter on 31 October 2022.
content:
The PM was right to concentrate on the budget and not fly to Cop 27. His critics will say he is weak if he gives in to pressure and changes his mind. This is not the most difficult decision he has to make.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
